name: Business Affairs
summary: For several years you’ve been so focused on work at a toy production company, you haven’t dated in forever! You’re in-line for a big promotion, when you get wrongly accused of spying for a rival company! Your boss gives you a second chance working on a huge project so you can redeem yourself and prove your innocence. You put your all into it, along with three seriously hot co-workers, all vying for your attention!
